website_summaries.verdict: When properly filled and frozen, these shot glass molds yield walls and bases that are thick enough to use for 2 consecutive rounds.
pros: Makes 8 beautifully formed shot glasses with reasonably thick bases
Food grade silicone is durable, easy to use, and dishwasher safe
Many owners report success with oven use – for sweeter shots – when placed on a tray
Attractive packaging is ideal for gifting
cons: Oven safety guidelines aren't specified on the packaging

customer_reviews.title: This is great. I actually put them in the oven without ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I actually put them in the oven without a tray and burned...even thought a lot melted it's actually still reusable. And my jolly rancher shot glasses came out great
customer_reviews.author: Elijah P

customer_reviews.title: not good. They leak
customer_reviews.text: not good. They leak. They freeze uneven so when you set them on the counter, you can't really use them (they are seriously tilted). Not a fan. I would skip on this. It does seem ... "cool" (see what I did there?) but they're disappointing. GOOD LUCK.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Honest

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of glass tends to come out uneven. Other then that, they are great.

customer_reviews.title: Ice cold shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: Makes an awesome shot glass! Makes the best fireball shot.

customer_reviews.title: they are great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I used these July 4th for tequila shots. They were a hit. They do melt incredibly fast and are somewhat difficult to get out. However, they are great fun!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Novelty Ice Cube Tray
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas present for my sister and obviously HAD to try it out. I loved it so much I decided to keep it and bought another one for my sister. I would highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've bought
customer_reviews.text: Having multiple shots ready for football games has been a big game changer. We had a plastic mold that only held 4. That took a long time to get shots ready. Now we get double that in the same time. Smashing them after taking a shot is the best part.

customer_reviews.title: great idea. I'm sure someone has done a better ...
customer_reviews.text: great idea. I'm sure someone has done a better job developing it. Mine is so thin that large bulges overtake the inside of each shot glass so I'd be lucky to be able to fit 3/4 of an ounce in each glass.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These shot glass molds have thicker walls than others on the market. The thick a walls make them last longer. Great Product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shot glass silicone, they came out perfect!

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: good stuff! i have not used them for ice yet but the options are only limited by your mind. I have been using them for candy shot glasses. (jolly ranchers work best) A couple of tips for oven use 10-15 min max no higher than 375, and use a cookie sheet. Not sure what other reviewers are talking about with the quality. I feel these are better made than another set i have had probably used 10 times and not showing any signs of tearing. however there is def a right way to take these out. which is slowly and carefully turning it inside out.
customer_reviews.author: TIFF

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully made product
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn't purchase this to make the frozen shot glasses although they works really well. I used them to make candy shot glasses. Held up well in the oven and freezer. This product did not lose it shape or anything. Wonderfully made product.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't say they are great as glasses

customer_reviews.title: Chills your shot in less than 30 seconds and can go for a second round!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool. My guests loved them. Chills your shots in less than 30 seconds. If you can handle another shot within several minutes of the first, these should still have integrity for the 2nd round. Don't fill it all the way to the brim or it will expand and have an unstable base.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea! We made baked Jolly Rancher candy shot ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! We made baked Jolly Rancher candy shot glasses at the kids' holiday party and they were such a hit. . Our friends have also made cider ice shot glasses. So you can bake it or freeze it to make great shot glasses. Great quality product that works exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentAmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, great for any party with adults
customer_reviews.text: HUGE hit at our party (pun intended?). We had something similar at an ice bar in Thailand and purchased these to be used as breakable shot glasses. Once you're finished with the shot, throw them on the ground. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Like any silicon mold
customer_reviews.text: Like any silicon mold, one accepts that the molded ice won't have a perfectly shape as it expands and the silicon moves slightly with it, but the result is still an awesome shot glass and a mold that can be used again and again without any fear of cracking or damage (and the ice is also very easy to remove).
customer_reviews.author: Roddick Rules 2009

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but the mold tore trying to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but the mold tore trying to get the finished product out. Only good for one use. Great concept though
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much fun we loved these easy to use ...
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great idea on paper...but
customer_reviews.text: They DO make ice shot glasses. They do that well. The problem I've come to learn is that making shot glasses out of ice is a good idea on paper, but not necessarily in reality. Here's what we discovered at my house while having some friends over. After pouring the drink and picking up the shot glass in your warm hand, it begins to melt slightly. The second time you go to pick it up, THEY ARE RIDICULOUSLY SLIPPERY. I watched them leave people's hands unexpectedly as they went to pick them up multiple times. That resulted in sticky margaritas all over the kitchen. Good times.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her roommates loved it. They didn't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Meierhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great mold, bad idea
customer_reviews.text: Great idea on paper, but I didn't think about it. The ice glasses melt all the time leaving a large puddle. They are hard to hold onto (keep slipping) and it really doesn't chill a shot very well. However I can't take away from the product, IT WORKS REALLY WELL, I really do like the product itself even though this wasn't a very logical idea.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Can withstand some heat !
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this to make starbursts shot glasses and it did its job ! Did not warp or melt in the oven like some other reviews I read . I only left it in the oven long enough for the candy to melt at 350 degrees so I know it wont get damaged. Excited to use on other things !
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: One time use and a rip
customer_reviews.text: Well I made my first shot glasses with the Jolly Ranchers they were gorgeous but as I was cleaning the mold side ripped I do have photos I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever!!! I have made about 150 shot glasses already. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cigdem Sica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful party idea. Can also be used to make jolly rancher shot glasses. 350 degrees for 9 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: KOVOT Cool Shots Silicone ICE Shot-Glass Mold - Tray of 8
product_meta.description: Perfectly Chilled ‘Neat’ Drinks Sounds like an oxymoron? Not with Kovot’s ice shot glasses! Our food-grade silicon mold turns plain water into beautifully sculpted ice shot glasses in a matter of hours. Pour yourself and your party guests a shot of your finest libation, and you’ll all enjoy the gentle chill of the ice glass without the spoilage brought on by rapid-melt ice cubes. Our mold tray is the largest one available, yielding eight ice shot glasses. Enough for the entire entourage! Prepare for your happy event by pre-freezing a few trays of shot glasses using the Kovot mold. Once frozen, they can be taken out of the molds and kept in the freezer until the party and then used as disposable shot glasses. Using this Kovot mold to make ice shot glasses out of clear water is just the tip of the iceberg. The fun possibilities are virtually endless – all you need to do is add food coloring to the water or substitute the liquid altogether. Imagine tea time with chocolate shot glasses… Or your child’s birthday party with little cups made of his/her favorite juice and little pieces of candy… Or a night in college dorm with everyone doing shots out of glasses colored to match the institution’s logo… For best use and to minimize spilling, fill the mold 3 quarters of the way and then place in the freezer. Once frozen, fill in the remaining amount and freeze again. Enjoy!
feature_bullets: Food-Grade Silicon is Flexible, Endlessly Reusable & Dishwasher safe
Ice Glass Chills Your Drink Without Watering it Down
Spares You the Need to Wash Out Used Glasses
Fun Addition to any Event or Party and Makes a Great Gift
